DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . To evaluate risk anal dysplasia woman cervical vulvar dysplasia . OUTLINE : Patients undergo colposcopy cervical Papanicolaou test Human papillomavirus ( HPV ) test follow anal Papanicolaou test high resolution anoscopy . Patients dysplastic anal lesion undergo repeat anoscopy 3 , 9 , 15 , 24 month . Patients normal anoscopy follow 1 2 year .
